name: CoderPad
description:
CoderPad is a comprehensive technical assessment platform that helps companies identify the best software engineering candidates regardless of their background.


How It Works

  1. Open the CoderPad widget
  2. Enter your API Key to connect
  3. Launch a live pad


Getting Started

  1. Create a CoderPad account on coderpad.io
  2. Get familiar with the environment
  3. Contact support@coderpad.io to get your API key
